headline.main: MOSCOW'S ARMY, BRAVING BIG GUNS, REPELS NAZI PUSH; Counter-Attacks Are Kept Up on Front West of Capital -- Kalinin Fight Goes On

lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Oct. 29 -- The Red Army, which held firm and counter-attacked yesterday in the face of one of the heaviest artillery barrages of the war thus far, continued today to strike at the Germans on the Mozhaisk and Maloyaroslavets salients before Moscow.
abstract: Germans repulsed, Moscow drive; counter-attacks kept up by USSR forces; Germans use heavy artillery barrages; Kalinin fight goes on but Germans are on defensive, that area; USSR rents Berlin raid; Crimean battle continues; USSR forces retake towns; Moscow area; Kharkov indus plants reptd moved; counter-attacks, Rostov area
